Articles.Content:
Hi all, you may have heard of me and my game Lunar Flight, well I thought it was time to show my face here and show my support for KSP.

I\'m horribly addicted now thanks Harvester! ;D

I spent the better part of a day just getting into an orbit, a very satisfying achievement... next stop \'The Mun\'

I\'m also very interested in the modding side of KSP and am thinking about digging in and seeing what I can contribute.

I\'m hoping to eventually be able to dock with space stations and do multiple trips up to assemble it, I\'m not sure if that is possible yet but I think it is something that is planned?

Really looking forward to see how KSP develops in the future as it grows into a fully fledged game.

Welcome to the forums.

Looks like an amazing game (Lunar Flight).

You worked for Electronic Arts

Welcome to the forums!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the forums sh0v0r, enjoy your stay here!

Hope to see some amazing mods from you.

-Mincespy

You\'re the man who worked for EA, aren\'t you? Nice to see you then!

Cheerz

Shaun
